result.description:
The Nintendo Switch App is designed to help enhance your online gameplay experience on Nintendo Switch™ 2 and Nintendo Switch. With this app, you can use friend features and game-specific services even when you're not playing! You can also view and share screenshots and videos uploaded from your console.

◆ Check friends' online status

You can check whether your friends are online and see what games they're playing. You can also choose to receive a notification in the app when a friend comes online.

◆ Use your smart device to add friends

You can add friends via their friend code or a QR Code even when you're not using your console.

◆ View your screenshots and videos

You can upload screenshots and videos saved in your console's album to the app, then view, save and share them.

◆ Game-specific services

You can access various features designed to enhance your online experience for supported games.

Currently, game-specific services are available for these games:

　・ The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition and The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
　　　・ Receive voice guidance to help you reach locations you haven't visited yet
　　　・ Share schematics and items via QR Codes
　　　・ And more!

　・ Splatoon 3
　　　・ View the online status of friends playing the game
　　　・ View your battle and Salmon Run stats
　　　・ View upcoming stage schedules
　　　・ And more!

　・ Animal Crossing: New Horizons
　　　・ Send custom designs created in Animal Crossing games on Nintendo 3DS to Animal Crossing: New Horizons
　　　・ Use your smart device to send messages that appear in-game
　　　・ View the online status of your Best Friends
　　　・ And more!

　・ Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
　　　・ View posted images and videos
　　　・ Queue downloads of user-created stages to play them in your copy of the game
　　　・ Receive notifications about upcoming events
　　　・ And more!

　・ Splatoon 2
　　　・ Check leaderboards and map schedules
　　　・ View your battle and Salmon Run stats
　　　・ And more!

Attention:
● A Nintendo Switch 2/Nintendo Switch console and supported software are required to use the service.
● A paid membership to Nintendo Switch Online is required to use some of the features of this app.
● You must have a Nintendo Account for ages 13 and up in order to use some of this app's features.
● Permanent internet connection required for use.
● May contain advertisements and product placement.
● Please see support.nintendo.com for details about the GameChat feature.

QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED in JAPAN and other countries.
result.releaseNotes:
・ The app's device compatibility has changed. It's now compatible with devices running iOS 16 and later.
・ The notification you receive when a friend comes online has now been updated to include the name of the software they're using, if applicable.
・ You can now send friend requests to users you chatted with in a GameChat session.
・ You can now copy the hashtags for a software title. This can be done from the details for a screenshot or video.
・ You can now create a Nintendo Switch App album in the iOS photos app. If you want to use this feature, you'll need to enable it from Settings in this app.
・ Fixed an issue that sometimes caused the order of screenshots and videos to change when downloading multiple at a time.
・ Other small bug fixes have also been made.
